short_summary: The Canadian Food Safety Information Network (CFSIN) includes a digital platform that provides real-time data sharing and collaboration capabilities among Federal/Provincial/Territorial (FPT) Food Safety Authorities across Canada.
description: The goal of the CFSIN initiative, led by the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA), is to help improve the detection and response to food safety issues and emergencies. A key component of CFSIN is shared data between CFIA and partner systems. There are two distinct streams of Information Management (IM) work, including, data within CFIA and CFIA systems that impact CFSIN and data from partners that will be shared with CFSIN.

full_summary:
Database Modelling / Information Modelling Services { solicitationNumber: 2023-01015 }
=====================================================================

### Overview
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites proposals for professional services to support the transformation of data within the Canadian Food Safety Information Network (CFSIN). The CFSIN initiative aims to improve detection and response to food safety issues, leveraging real-time data sharing and collaboration among Federal/Provincial/Territorial (FPT) Food Safety Authorities.

### Scope
This project involves data modelling within CFIA systems impacting the CFSIN, as well as data from partner systems to be shared with the CFSIN. The successful contractor will assist CFIA in developing transformation logic to support the achievement of CFSIN's goals.

### Requirements

* Development of data models for the CFSIN digital platform
* Integration of data from partner systems
* Transformation logic to support data sharing and collaboration
* Collaboration with CFIA and partner systems

### Eligibility
The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) are applicable to this solicitation.

### Tender Details

* Reference Number: 2023-01027571
* Publication Date: February 28, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 10, 2023 @ 2:00 PM EST
* Tender Status: Expired

### Contact Information

To obtain further information about this solicitation, please contact:

Alexander Lisowski
Email: alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca
